about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Go cross-border and shuttle along the rural, hilly backdrops of Europe in Train Sim World®. Take a trip back to the early 2010s and climb aboard the classic electric BR 111 - tap into Deutsche Bahn regional services between Germany and Austria with Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim!

With a history spanning over 160 years, the Rosenheim - Salzburg railway has long been a line of vital importance between Germany and Austria. Originally envisaged as early as 1828, it took many years of theorising, designing, and funding to construct. Today, the line is a key corridor for all manners of traffic and has been subject to constant improvements over the decades.

A new journey awaits through the German state of Bavaria. From the classic cab of a 1970s legend, the DB BR 111, accelerate out of the city of Rosenheim on regional, yet international services. Wind your way through the countryside and cross the border into Austria, coming to rest in musical Salzburg. Alongside the 111, a medley of motive power accompanies the ranks, including the BR 185.2 and ÖBB 4024 for freight and S-Bahn duty.

In Train Sim World®, the line is represented as it was in 2013, still featuring classic DB traction, but sporting the new canopy construction of Salzburg Hbf. Serve towns in the Bavarian hills and travel across the border of Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim!

Key Features


  • 89 km route from Rosenheim, Germany to Salzburg, Austria set in approx. 2013
  • Included rolling stock:
    • DB BR 111 electric locomotive in DB red livery
    • DB BR 185.2 electric locomotive in DB Railion livery
    • DB Gen 4 Dosto coaches, Habbiins and Roos-t wagons
    • ÖBB 4024 EMU in ÖBB livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • 5 engaging Scenarios and an authentic Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 6.4 GB
